# CUTSCENE::SET_CUTSCENE_TRIGGER_AREA

## Summary
Allows you to set up a special cut scene trigger area. More info.

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** offsetFromSceneOriginX
* **FLOAT** offsetFromSceneOriginY
* **FLOAT** offsetFromSceneOriginZ
* **FLOAT** triggerRadius: Size of the trigger area
* **FLOAT** triggerOrient: The orientation of the trigger angle
* **FLOAT** triggerAngle: The angle either side og the trigger oreient - defines the min and max angle for tiggereing

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Depending on the type of of cutscene it maybe possible orientate the cutscene over a range of angles.

Only used twice in R* scripts
